scc_rules.description: Check whether Application Load Balancer for VPC is configured with multiple members in the pool
scc_rules.ignore_reason: This rule is not relevant to since the autoscale vsi are not attached at provision time

scc_rules.description: Check whether Application Load Balancer for VPC has health check configured when created
scc_rules.ignore_reason: Health check is configured on Application Load Balancer

scc_rules.description: Check whether Application Load Balancer for VPC is configured to convert HTTP client requests to HTTPS
scc_rules.ignore_reason: This rule is not relevant since example is using a tcp listener

scc_rules.description: Check whether Application Load Balancer for VPC uses HTTPS (SSL & TLS) instead of HTTP
scc_rules.ignore_reason: This rule is not relevant since example is using a tcp listener
